DOC.criteria: Age 30 75 year . Binary stenosis > 70 % de novo lesion native coronary artery . Reference lumen diameter proximal target lesion 2.5 mm < 4.0 mm . Reference lesion length < 30 mm . The target lesioin cover makimum two overlap stent single lesion . Written inform consent sign . Pregnant breast feed woman . Intolerance aspirin , clopidogrel ( Plavix® ) , ticlopidine ( Ticlid® ) , heparin , bivalirudin , stainless steel , contrast agent ( adequately premedicated ) , parylene , polylacticacid ( PLA ) , Biolimus A9 ( analogue ) . Lesion locate protect unprotected Left Main Coronary Artery . STEMI within 72 hour prior index procedure . The patient another drugeluting stent ( DES ) implant within 12 month prior index procedure . CCS Class III patient patient LVEF < 40 % . Diffuse lesions > 40 mm length . Renal impairment , serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl . Complicated anatomy Chronic Total Occlusion ( CTO ) , Bifurcation Lesions ( side branch > 2.5 mm ) Triple Vessel Disease ( TVD ) . Lesion predilated successfully . History gastritis and/or bleed history limit usual dual antiplatelet regime . Patient comorbid condition ( ) could limit his/her ability participate study , comply followup requirement impact scientific integrity study .
